sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnwǎn de yuèliang hěn yuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La lune est très ronde ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The moon is very round tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōumò nǐ yǒu shénme ānpái?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qu'as-tu prévu pour le week-end ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What plans do you have for the weekend?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhǔyào wèntí yǐjīng jiějué le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le problème principal a été résolu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The main problem has been solved.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ hái méi zuòwán zuòyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'ai pas encore fini mes devoirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I haven't finished my homework yet.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng ānpái yī cì huìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez organiser une réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please arrange a meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yào yǒu shénme zuòyòng?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel effet a ce médicament ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What effect does this medicine have?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ tōngzhī tiē zài bǎn shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez afficher l'avis sur le tableau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please post the notice on the board.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng bǎoliú zhè fèn wénjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais conserver ce document.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like to keep this document.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请帮我搬一下这个箱子。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ bān yīxià zhège xiāngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aide-moi à déplacer cette boîte, s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me move this box.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ mén guānshang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez fermer la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please close the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhèngzài xiě niándù bàogào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en train de rédiger le rapport annuel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is writing the annual report.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ mǎi yīliáo bǎoxiǎn le ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: As-tu acheté une assurance maladie ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Have you bought health insurance?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他会说中文并且写得很好。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā huì shuō Zhōngwén bìngqiě xiě de hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il parle chinois et en plus il écrit très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He can speak Chinese and also writes very well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de běnlǐng hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a de grandes compétences.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has great skills.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǒu bìyào tíqián yùdìng ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Est-il nécessaire de réserver à l'avance ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is it necessary to book in advance?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen duì shū le zhè chǎng bǐsài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre équipe a perdu ce match.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our team lost this match.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个产品符合国际标准。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège chǎnpǐn fúhé guójì biāozhǔn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce produit répond aux normes internationales.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This product meets international standards.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bōfàng xià yī shǒu gē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez jouer la chanson suivante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please play the next song.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 不论结果如何，我都支持你。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùlùn jiéguǒ rúhé, wǒ dōu zhīchí nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel que soit le résultat, je te soutiens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Regardless of the result, I support you.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一部很好看的电影。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī bù hěn hǎokàn de diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un très bon film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a very good movie.
